Package com.sri.ai.grinder.core.constraint

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MultiVariableContextWithCheckedProperty.ContextDependentProblemStepSolverMaker
    A BinaryFunction making a SingleVariableConstraint for a given variable and current context.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractConstraint
    An abstract Constraint implementing theory, contradiction and cloning mechanisms.
    AbstractSingleVariableConstraint
    An abstract Expression with efficient internal representation for a conjunction in a given theory.
    AbstractSingleVariableConstraintWithDependentNormalizedAtoms
    An implementation of AbstractSingleVariableConstraint for theories in which there is interaction between normalized atoms.
    AbstractSingleVariableConstraintWithIndependentNormalizedAtoms
    An extension of AbstractSingleVariableConstraint for theories in which there is no interaction between distinct normalized atoms.
    AbstractTheory  
    AbstractTheoryTestingSupport  
    CompleteMultiVariableContext
    A multi-variable context that detects unsatisfiability insofar as the single-variable constraint theories detect it themselves.
    CompleteMultiVariableContext.CompleteMultiVariableContextDependentProblemStepSolverMaker  
    ConstraintSplitting
    A helper class containing information regarding the splitting a constraint by a literal in the most efficient way possible, optionally under a context.
    ContextSplitting
    A specialization of ConstraintSplitting for Context.
    DefaultMultiVariableConstraint
    An Constraint on multiple variables.
    MultiVariableContextWithCheckedProperty
    An Context on multiple variables, with the ability to ensure all single-variable constraints that are part of it have a property determined by a ExpressionStepSolver, or otherwise the total constraint is deemed unsatisfiable.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ConstraintSplitting.Result
    The four possible result of splitting a constraint by a literal.
